title: Installation issue: perl 5.26.2 install fails (with Spack v0.13.1)
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

Fresh spack v0.13.1 install on CentOS Linux 7.7. Added compiler gcc@7.3.0 with Spack.

```console
$ spack install perl@5.26.2 %gcc@7.3.0 target=x86_64 
==> [2019-11-19-11:30:55.467591] Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 255:
    '/cfs/software/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/perl-5.26.2-xw47qvhl6cdwrbqn4jmnxr4zwxs6gdz2/bin/perl' 'Makefile.PL'
```

### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux build02.hpc.zhaw.ch 3.10.0-1062.4.1.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Fri Oct 18 17:15:30 UTC 2019 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:	CentOS Linux release 7.7.1908 (Core)
``` 

### Additional information

Sometimes the issue benefits from additional details. In these cases there are
a few things we can suggest doing. First of all, you can post the full output of:
```console
$ spack spec --install-status perl@5.26.2 target=x86_64
[swadm@build02 linux]$ spack spec --install-status perl@5.26.2 target=x86_64
Input spec
--------------------------------
 -   perl@5.26.2 arch=linux-None-x86_64

Concretized
--------------------------------
 -   perl@5.26.2%gcc@7.3.0+cpanm patches=0eac10ed90aeb0459ad8851f88081d439a4e41978e586ec743069e8b059370ac +shared+threads arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]      ^gdbm@1.18.1%gcc@7.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]          ^readline@8.0%gcc@7.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]              ^ncurses@6.1%gcc@7.3.0~symlinks~termlib arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]                  ^pkgconf@1.6.3%gcc@7.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64

```
